title: Trickery Domain
content:
SSION

By selecting the Trickery Domain Cleric subclass you'll also gain access to:

Level 1 - Domain Spells (Disguise Self, Charm Person) Level 1 - Blessing of the Trickster (Action) Level 2 - Invoke Duplicity (Action) Level 3 - Domain Spells (Mirror Image, Pass Without Trace) Level 5 - Domain Spells (Bestow Curse, Fear) Level 6 - Channel Divinity: Cloak of Shadows (Action) Level 7 - Domain Spells (Polymorph, Dimension Door) Level 8 - Divine Strike: Poison (Action) Level 9 - Domain Spells (Domi
